name: Knight of Hope
description:
Chaos and despair corrupts this world. The wielder of Hope must fight endless waves of enemies to stop the Chaos King. YOU must wield Hope and save this world!

Fight endless waves of enemies and bosses to see if you can stop chaos and despair. Can you will hold out?

Controls: A & D to move, Space to jump, K to swing sword, L to shot left or right, W to shot up, W+L to shot diagonally, S to fall down, ; to use item, P to pause.

FAQ

Q - Why are their 3 files?

A - The used game engine does not have a good in-game resizing tool. So we made 3 resolutions (1536x960, 1024x640, and 512x320) in case you have a older screen. If a bigger resolution is needed, inform me and we'll try to add it.

Q - Why is it not just one .exe file?

A - It made the game stutter and lag so we opted to just give you the file.

Q - Why is there a watermark in the corner?

A - We could not afford at this time to by the full game engine licences, so we settled with releasing the game with the mark and if the game makes the 99$ we need, we'll by the licence and remove the mark.

Q - Is this game worth 1$ of my money?

A - Knight of Hope is in many ways different and could be fun experience for many indie game lovers. But we at CRA Games believe it is worth every penny :)

We at CRA Games HOPE you have an fun playing are first full game!

May contain glitches and bugs. Pleas comment or send your problems, improvements and advice to me.

as of 8.20.2020. "we" stands for only one person :)
